SEARCH
Package application

Class UpdateTestingAutomation

java.lang.Object
application.UpdateTestingAutomation
public class UpdateTestingAutomation extends Object
Automated testing for update functionality in Question and Answer classes.

This class connects to the database and performs basic automated test cases to ensure that updating questions and answers works correctly.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Gerum

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main test runner for update testing automation. Connects to the database and executes test cases for question and answer updates.
      Parameters:
      args - The command-line arguments passed to the program.

    • performQuestionCase

      private static void performQuestionCase(int testCase, String initialText, String updatedText, boolean expectedPass)

    • performAnswerCase

      private static void performAnswerCase(int testCase, String initialText, String updatedText, boolean expectedPass)
      Performs a test case for updating an answer.
      Parameters:
      testCase - The test case number.
      initialText - The original content of the answer.
      updatedText - The updated content for the answer.
      expectedPass - Whether the update is expected to succeed.

    • performAnsweredCase

      private static void performAnsweredCase(int testCase, boolean initialAnswered, boolean updatedAnswered, boolean expectedPass)
      Performs a test case for updating answered status.
      Parameters:
      testCase - The test case number.
      initialAnswered - The original answered status.
      updatedAnswered - The updated answered status.
      expectedPass - Whether the update is expected to succeed.
